content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name to get started with scheduling your HVAC service appointment?
I prefer not to say my name, can we just get to the service?
I understand your preference. To help you best, I do need to at least confirm your address to check if we're able to serve your location. Could you please provide your address?
Thank you for the address. Let me check if we're servicing that area.
I’m sorry, but it looks like 123 Elm Street is outside of our current service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to assist at that location. Is there anything else I can help you with?
